editor

Class FindAndReplace

  • java.lang.Object
    • editor.FindAndReplace

  • public class FindAndReplace
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to build the logic of find and replace methods by using the written methods in the RSyntax text editor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FindAndReplace(javax.swing.JFrame findAndReplaceFrame, javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame, org.fife.ui.rsyntaxtextarea.RSyntaxTextArea textArea, javax.swing.JButton nextButton, javax.swing.JButton prevButton, javax.swing.JButton replButton, javax.swing.JButton replAllButton, javax.swing.JTextField findText, javax.swing.JTextField replaceText, javax.swing.JCheckBox matchCase, javax.swing.JCheckBox wholeToken)
      A constructor to take the main frame objects from parameter to use for building find and replace logic

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FindAndReplace

        public FindAndReplace(javax.swing.JFrame findAndReplaceFrame,
                      javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame,
                      org.fife.ui.rsyntaxtextarea.RSyntaxTextArea textArea,
                      javax.swing.JButton nextButton,
                      javax.swing.JButton prevButton,
                      javax.swing.JButton replButton,
                      javax.swing.JButton replAllButton,
                      javax.swing.JTextField findText,
                      javax.swing.JTextField replaceText,
                      javax.swing.JCheckBox matchCase,
                      javax.swing.JCheckBox wholeToken)
        A constructor to take the main frame objects from parameter to use for building find and replace logic
        Parameters:
        findAndReplaceFrame - take the find and replace frame to construct
        mainFrame - take the main frame to build find and replace frame according to main frame place
        textArea - take text area of the text editor
        nextButton - take next button of find and replace frame
        prevButton - take previous button of find and replace frame
        replButton - take replace button of find and replace frame
        replAllButton - take replace all button of find and replace frame
        findText - take the text field which contains the text searched in text
        replaceText - take the text field which contains the text replaced with searched text
        matchCase - take the check box to indicate the case sensitivity of search
        wholeToken - take the check box to indicate the search type in terms of in word or apart from other word conditions
